message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $16,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I was hoping for. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I'm still very interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can we meet in the middle again?
